conbody.p: Local fields provide extension of T24 data model. A local field is a custom field you can define and reuse for extending T24 application(s).

A local field requires several steps before being available in T24 application(s).
The first step is to define the local field.
Once created, a local field can be referenced , in one or many applications, as single or multiple value field.
You need to deploy local field(s) and the local reference(s) in application you created, to T24 environment.
The last step is to import applications again into DS. You now have up to date application with extension you added.
You can design screens with the new local fields.
